de: Von seiner Klippe aus überblickt Orcher die Seine-Mündung und die Pont de Normandie. Die Festung wurde in ein elegantes Wohnhaus mit besonders edlen Holzvertäfelungen umgewandelt.
en:
From the top of its cliff, Orcher overlooks the Seine estuary and the Normandy bridge. The fortress was transformed in the 18th century into an elegant dwelling, with particularly refined woodwork.

it: Dall'alto della sua scogliera, Orcher domina l'estuario della Senna e il Pont de Normandie. La fortezza è stata trasformata in un'elegante dimora, con una lavorazione del legno particolarmente raffinata.
fr: Du haut de sa falaise, Orcher domine l'estuaire de la Seine et le pont de Normandie. La forteresse a été transformée en élégante habitation, aux boiseries particulièrement raffinées.
nl: Vanaf de top van de klif kijkt Orcher uit over de monding van de Seine en de Pont de Normandie. Het fort is omgetoverd tot een elegante woning, met bijzonder verfijnd houtwerk.
es: Desde lo alto de su acantilado, Orcher domina el estuario del Sena y el Puente de Normandía. La fortaleza se ha transformado en una elegante vivienda, con una carpintería especialmente refinada.

de: Von seiner Klippe aus überblickt Orcher die Seine-Mündung und die Pont de Normandie. Die Festung wurde in ein elegantes Wohnhaus mit besonders edlen Holzvertäfelungen umgewandelt.
en:
From the top of its cliff, Orcher overlooks the Seine estuary and the Normandy bridge. The fortress was transformed in the 18th century into an elegant dwelling, with particularly refined woodwork.

The 30-minute guided tour will allow you to discover the entire ground floor with in particular the old guard room protected by 2.8m thick walls transformed into a library (5000 volumes from the 18th to the present day) ), the large living room with famous rock-style woodwork and the restored vestibule which has regained its 18th century radiance.

On this occasion, you will also see the restored Manneville collection, a series of 5 single-story portraits that showcase the richness of 18th century dresses and uniforms painted in the famous Bernay workshop.

By crossing Orcher you will travel from the Middle Ages to the 21st century with a stopover in the 18th century and you will discover the living environment of exceptional personalities involved in the history of Normandy and France.

de: Basierend auf der Eröffnungsperiode des Vorjahres.
en: Based on the previous year's opening period.
it: In base al periodo di apertura dell'anno precedente.
fr: Basé sur la période d'ouverture de l'année précédente.
nl: Gebaseerd op de openingsperiode van het voorgaande jaar.
es: Basado en el periodo de apertura del año anterior.
